title: cannot retrieve term positions from indices using ISOLatin1AccentFilter
description: We found term positions cannot be acquied for terms with accents if we index non-ascii texts with ISOLatin1AccentFilter to eliminate accents. This is a big problem if we want to highlight the queried accented terms.

comments.content:
